text: @WhiteHouse Everyone, including #GOP @senatemajldr governors,newspapers, all  elected officials, all former presidents and every sane American should call on Trump to resign,or be removed for failure on #COVID19 and now calls Amercans to protest elected officials, causing MORE risks.
